Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
wait(1) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

Tool = script.Parent local workPortals = nil
function fire(v)
Tool.Handle.Fire:play() local touched = false
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
Tool.Parent.Torso["Right Shoulder"].DesiredAngle = 3.6 Tool.Parent.Torso["Right Shoulder"].MaxVelocity = 0.5
local missile = Instance.new("Part")
local m = Tool.Mesh:Clone() m.Parent = missile
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + (v * 8)
missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + v) missile.Position = spawnPos missile.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) missile.Velocity = v * 80 missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(23) missile.Shape = 0 missile.BottomSurface = 0 missile.TopSurface = 0 missile.Name = "Portal" missile.Elasticity = 0 missile.Reflectance = 0 missile.Friction = .4
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,102,0) force.Parent = missile
local script = Tool.PortalScript:clone() script.Parent = missile script.Disabled = false
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
local portalSound = Instance.new("Sound") portalSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=34320976" portalSound.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = workPortals
local con = missile.Touched:connect(function(part) if part and part.Parent then if part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil and not touched then updatePortals(missile) touched = true end end end) wait(3) con:disconnect() if not touched then print("removed") missile:Destroy() end
end
function updatePortals(missile) --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer local portals = {} for i, v in pairs(workPortals:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then table.insert(portals, v) end end if #portals > 2 then for i, v in pairs(portals) do if #portals > 2 and i < (#portals - 1) then v:Destroy() end end end end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated()
--[[if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false]]
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
fire(lookAt)
--Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)
function onEquipped()
workPortals = Instance.new("Model") workPortals.Name = Tool.Parent.Name .."Portals" workPortals.Parent = game.Workspace
local portalValue = Instance.new("BoolValue") portalValue.Name = "Portaling" portalValue.Parent = workPortals
end
function onUnequipped() workPortals:Destroy() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local beam = script.Parent local first = true
function setUpPortal(part)
if part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then beam:Destroy() end
beam.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=3270017" beam.Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=3270066" beam.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(10,10,10) beam.Anchored = true beam.CanCollide = false
for i = 1, 3 do local fireOne = Instance.new("Fire") fireOne.Color = Color3.new(0,0,0) if i == 1 then fireOne.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(100/255,0,0) elseif i == 2 then fireOne.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0,100/255,0) else fireOne.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0,0,100/255) end fireOne.Heat = 0 fireOne.Size = 15 fireOne.Parent = beam end
local xFactor = part.Position.x/math.abs(part.Position.x + part.Position.z) local zFactor = part.Position.z/math.abs(part.Position.x + part.Position.z)
local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = beam weld.Parent = beam weld.Part1 = game:GetService("Workspace").Terrain weld.C0 = CFrame.new(beam.Position - part.Position) weld.C1 = CFrame.new(beam.Position,part.Position) end
function findOtherPortal(part) stuff = beam.Parent:GetChildren() for i = 1, #stuff do if stuff[i].className == "Part" and stuff[i] ~= beam then return stuff[i] end end return nil end
function jumpPortal(part) --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer if part and part.Parent then local human = part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if human then local otherPortal = findOtherPortal(part) if otherPortal == nil then return end if otherPortal:FindFirstChild("PortalScript") == nil then return end beam.Parent.Portaling.Value = true part.Parent:MoveTo(otherPortal.Position + (beam.CFrame.lookVector.unit * -5)) otherPortal.Sound:Play() wait(1) beam.Parent.Portaling.Value = false end end end
function onTouched(part) if part and part.Parent then if first then first = false setUpPortal(part) else if beam.Parent.Portaling.Value == false then jumpPortal(part) end end end end
beam.Touched:connect(onTouched)
